name: Keepr Of Books
description:
Small idea for a simulation book store owner game

Inspired by open world games that allowed you to collect books, and decorate personal locations. I noticed some players wanted more direct control over the decorative part of the game

Pulls data from free online sources for real information (no book information included in game). Requires internet for initial lookup of a book but will keep a copy locally afterwards

Basic features:

- Furniture decoration

- Pickup/Place books

- Pull live data and replaces cover on physical book

- End of day sales/ordering
